name: places/ChIJ36g55yz1wokRoe1KdZ4XXcc
formattedAddress: 119 Dyckman St, New York, NY 10034, USA
adrFormatAddress: 119 Dyckman St, New York, NY 10034, USA

originalText.text: Worst service I have ever experienced, they were rude, abusive and disrespectful. They denied me my records, and wanted to charge me $35 for the interocular distance, when I refused, the woman took all the papers and I am not sure if she threw them away or ripped them in pieces. Besides all of this, I waited more than 30 minutes when I was the ONLY customer in the store. I am a Latin woman, and I know we may have some cultural differences sometimes, this was not the case, just an extremely rude and abusive business that shouldn’t be part of our community. AWFUL, AWFUL PLACE!

text.text: Worst service I have ever experienced, they were rude, abusive and disrespectful. They denied me my records, and wanted to charge me $35 for the interocular distance, when I refused, the woman took all the papers and I am not sure if she threw them away or ripped them in pieces. Besides all of this, I waited more than 30 minutes when I was the ONLY customer in the store. AWFUL, AWFUL PLACE!

originalText.text:
Estoy muy decepcionado con este establecimiento y con la forma en que me trataron, especialmente como cliente nuevo. Entré al establecimiento y no me saludaron en absoluto. Me senté y esperé 15 minutos a que llegara un trabajador y todavía no recibo ningún reconocimiento. Otra persona entró 15 minutos después y fue inmediatamente recibida y asistida mientras yo todavía estaba sentado esperando. Caminé hasta el mostrador pidiendo ayuda y haciendo saber que estaba esperando y ni siquiera recibí un "hola", mientras que otros ahora están recibiendo un servicio rápido, ¡al cual los cuatro trabajadores no respondieron! Luego me dijeron que no me podían ver. Después de informarles que tengo una cita y hace 2 días repasamos por qué necesitaba visitarlos, cambiaron de opinión y dijeron que solo puedo hacer un examen y nada más. Es lamentable porque esta ubicación se ve mejor que la ubicación anterior y tiene muchas más opciones de marcos, pero el servicio es terrible y me aseguraré de no volver nunca más. Para mí es suficiente el mal trato, la desinformación y la sensación de no querer ni siquiera ser atendido. ¡Regala el dinero que tanto te ha costado ganar bajo tu propia responsabilidad! ¡El optometrista fue genial! ¡Son las personas de servicio al cliente que están al frente quienes van a ahuyentar a los clientes!
​

text.text:
I am very disappointed in this establishment and the way I was treated, especially as a new customer. I entered the establishment and they did not greet me at all. I sat and waited 15 minutes for a worker to arrive and still no recognition. Another person came in 15 minutes later and was immediately greeted and assisted while I was still sitting waiting. I walked up to the counter asking for help and letting it be known I was waiting and didn't even get a "hello" while others are now getting fast service, to which the four workers didn't respond! Then they told me they couldn't see me. After letting them know I have an appointment and 2 days ago we went over why I needed to visit them, they changed their mind and said I can only do an exam and nothing more. It's unfortunate because this location looks better than the previous location and has many more frame options, but the service is terrible and I will make sure to never go back again. For me, the bad treatment, the misinformation and the feeling of not even wanting to be cared for are enough. Give away your hard-earned money at your own risk! The optometrist was great! It's the customer service people at the front who are going to chase customers away!
​
